_comment: BACKEND DEPENDENCIES REMOVED FOR STATIC SITE CONVERSION
_note: This file previously contained Node.js backend dependencies including Express.js, SQLite, JWT authentication, bcrypt password hashing, and other server-side packages. All backend functionality has been removed to convert this to a static site suitable for deployment on platforms like Netlify, Vercel, GitHub Pages, or any static hosting service.
_deployment_instructions: This is now a static site. Simply serve the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files using any static hosting service. No build process or server setup required.
